Gubernur Bengkulu Sambut Api Abadi Torch Relay Porwil ke X se Sumatera
01 Nov 2019, 18:57 by Roki EP


Gubernur Bengkulu Sambut Api Abadi Torch Relay Porwil ke X se Sumatera

KBRN, Bengkulu : Setelah diambil dari pusat energi panas bumi di Kabupaten Lebong dan melalui perjalanan cukup jauh melewati tiga wilayah Kabupaten, yakni Kabupaten Rejang Lebong, Kabupaten Kepahiang dan Bengkulu Tengah, pada Jumat (1/11/2019) sore, api abadi Torch Relay Pekan Olahraga Wilayah (Porwil) ke X se Sumatera, telah sampai di Kota Bengkulu.
Sebelum rombongan yang membawa api abadi Torch Relay Porwil ke 10 se Sumatera, disambut oleh Gubernur Bengkulu Rohidin Mersyah bersama Forum Komunikasi Pimpinan Daerah (Forkopimda) serta Organisasi Perangkat Daerah (OPD) di lingkup Pemprov Bengkulu, dengan didampingi pengurus KONI dan sejumlah atlit bertempat di gedung Balai Raya Semarak Bengkulu, dijemput oleh Wakil Walikota Dedy Wahyudi bersama jajaran Pemerintah Kota Bengkulu di simpang 4 Nakau, perbatasan masuk Kota Bengkulu.
Seusai menerima api obor Porwil ke X se Sumatera, Gubernur Rohidin Mersyah berharap, dalam Porwil ini bisa menorehkan prestasi bagi Bengkulu. Apalagi sebelumnya cabang olahraga sepak bola yang tidak disangka-sangka, dipastikan akan berlaga di seri final pada Minggu lusa, melawan tim sepak bola dari Aceh.
“Untuk itu saya mengajak seluruh elemen masyarakat agar bersama-sama mendukung dan mensuport para atlit Bengkulu yang akan berlaga pada Porwil ini. Mengingat dengan dukungan penuh tersebut diyakini akan menambah semangat sekaligus motivasi untuk menjadi juara nantinya,” harap Gubernur.
Dengan telah berada api obor Porwil ini, akan diinapkan semalam di Gedung Balai Raya Semarak, dan besok pagi akan kembali diarah keliling kota Bengkulu sebelum menuju opening Porwil di lapangan sepak bola stadion Semarak Bengkulu, yang direncanakan di buka oleh Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga, Zainudin Amali.
“Insya Allah Menpora akan hadir secara langsung membuka Porwil ke X se Sumatera Bengkulu, besok malam,” tukas Gubernur Rohidin.

Bengkulu Governor Welcomes the Eternal Fire Torch Relay Regional Office to X all over Sumatra
Nov 01 2019, 18:57 by Roki EP


Bengkulu Governor Welcomes the Eternal Fire Torch Relay Regional Office to X all over Sumatra

KBRN, Bengkulu: After being taken from the geothermal energy center in Lebong Regency and traveling quite far through three regencies, namely Rejang Lebong Regency, Kepahiang Regency and Bengkulu Tengah, on Friday (1/11/2019) afternoon, the Torch Relay's eternal fire Regional Sports Week (Porwil) to X throughout Sumatra, has arrived in the city of Bengkulu.
Before the group that carried the Torch Torch Regional Immortal fire to 10 throughout Sumatra, was welcomed by the Governor of Bengkulu Rohidin Mersyah together with the Regional Leaders Communication Forum (Forkopimda) as well as the Organization of Regional Apparatus (OPD) within the scope of the Bengkulu Provincial Government, accompanied by KONI management and a number of athletes located in the building Balai Raya Semarak Bengkulu, was picked up by Deputy Mayor Dedy Wahyudi together with the Bengkulu City Government at the intersection of 4 Nakau, the border of Bengkulu City.
After receiving the X Por Torch torch fire throughout Sumatra, Governor Rohidin Mersyah hopes, in this Regional Regional Office can make achievements for Bengkulu. Especially before the unexpected branch of soccer, certain to compete in the final series on Sunday the day after tomorrow, against a soccer team from Aceh.
"For this reason, I invite all elements of the community to jointly support and support Bengkulu athletes who will compete in this Regional Office. Given that full support is believed to increase enthusiasm as well as motivation to become champions later, "hoped the Governor.
With the Porwil torch fire already set up, it will be set up overnight at the Balai Raya Semarak Building, and tomorrow morning will be directed back around the city of Bengkulu before heading to the opening of the Regional Office at the Semarak Bengkulu football stadium, which is planned to be opened by the Minister of Youth and Sports, Zainudin Amali .
"Insha Allah Menpora will be present directly to open the Regional Office X to Sumatra Bengkulu, tomorrow night," said Governor Rohidin.
